name: Harry Gooch Reloaded: Mortem Incarnatum
description:
A remake of Harry Gooch: Mortem Incarnatum, the first of the critically acclaimed harry gooch series, and a game many consider to be the godfather of shooters.

I have rebuilt the game from the ground up, true dynamic soft shadows, radiant AI, real world physics. Go where you want, do whatever you want, dynamic volumetric lighting. All of this is being generated in real time by the game. And the best part about all this, is it just works.

harry gooch 2 and 3 remakes are also in development.
